original_title: Redheaded Vengeance: The Life and Death of Pigtails
overview: Redheaded Vengeance: The Life and Death of Pigtails was shot on VHS between Fall 1996 and Summer 1999 (in and around Columbus, Ohio). Final editing was completed in 2022.
title: Redheaded Vengeance: The Life and Death of Pigtails
